attributes.action: stop and reduce the rise in train and bus fares
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
How absolutly disgusted i was , when i boarded a bus and was charged £2 to get home on a red bus 

Only 6 or 7 years ago i remember it was 70p-£1 , im disgusted ,you want us to use public transport but youre forcing us more in to our cars , the public transport system is not efficiant enough ( now your trying to tax us off the road!)
when will this madness stop. You  you are supposed to bea goverment for the people , the working class ..... you're not .
